resources.string: This application was created as a final project for the Mobile Programming with Native Technologies course in the fall of 2024.
The application uses the SuperHero API, and its documentation can be found at https://superheroapi.com/.
By pressing a button, the app randomly selects a superhero and displays general information about them. In the settings, you can change color for font and background.
The application was created by Juha-Matti Huhta https://github.com/AvaRaGane
Dark blue background and golden text
Black background and neon green text
Black background and neon orange text
